entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
